lines.text: I'm sure that the way to say what I'd like to say will occur to me after you've gone.
A golf course is nothing but a poolroom moved outdoors.
And he gave you the bird?
I gave them both my blessing.
And they gave you the bird.
Hail, Alma Mater, thy time-honored halls shall echo with our praise till we die; and round our hearts are the ivy-covered walls of East St. Louis High.
